name: Let Ava Game!
description:
ALL assets except for audio (art, animation, writing, code, graphics, iconography, design, etc.) were made during the duration of the Beaver Hacks Summer Sprint 2021 (o7.o9 ~ o7.11). 🎮 THE GAME

"Let Ava Game!" is a side-scrolling endless runner arcade game that can be played on Windows, MacOS, or Linux. It was made by three people in two days on Unity. You play as a small gamer girl and have to dodge or defeat chores like laundry or trash, while collecting coins or health.

Story: 11-year old Ava loves to play games. She plays her favorite apps nearly every day! But her mother doesn’t approve. To dissuade her child from the treacheries of gaming, Mom hurls chores to distract Ava from her craving. Ava now maneuvers through the world of chores and responsibilities in the lens of gaming. How far can you get?

🕹️ GAME MECHANICS

 ⟐ Spacebar - shoot your water gun

 ⟐ UP Arrow Key - jump / double-jump
